nodes.text: The Balmorra system, also known as the Nevoota system, was a star system located within the Colonies region of the galaxy which included the planet Balmorra. The system contained six planets.

While first known as the Nevoota system, the Balmorra system was first mentioned in "Rookies." The Essential Atlas also called it the latter name, in its convention of naming every system after its primary planet.
